[quote=“EclipsedSkapez, post:5, topic:426504”]I got ::pickup I need a delta command where you can type ::getid godsword for example
and it tells them all the item names and the item id in that category[/quote]

DeltaScape doesn’t have it, convert the PI command to work with Delta.

item.title: Need Help with a command! - Eclipsed
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

EDIT: Was making 3 different threads really needed? Also, Delta doesn’t have a “GetItemID” command. You can convert it to work with Delta.

EclipsedSkapez:

This command is for Project insanity I need it for delta

Ripped directly from DeltaScape:

if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2){
		        String[] args = command.split(" ");
	         if(args.length == 3) {
			int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
				addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
			} else {
				sM("No such item.");
			}
		} else {
			sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
		}
	    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with a command! - Eclipsed
item.dc:creator: @EclipsedSkapez EclipsedSkapez
item.description:
@EclipsedSkapez wrote:

Hi im wanting to make a ::getid command where if they type in ::getid dharok it tells them all the item names and the item id in that category.

                    How do I make this command for delta? :





                     I need this command for delta:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("getid")) { String a[] = playerCommand.split(" "); String name = ""; int results = 0; for(int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) name = name + a[i]+ " "; name = name.substring(0, name.length()-1); c.sendMessage("Searching: " + name); for (int j = 0; j < Server.itemHandler.ItemList.length; j++) { if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null) if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ").toLowerCase().contains(name.toLowerCase())) { c.sendMessage("<col=255>" + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ") + " - " + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId); results++; } } c.sendMessage(results + " results found..."); }

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with a command! - Eclipsed
